Zindziswa "Zindzi" Mandela (23 Disemba 1960 ♡ 13 Julaị 2020), nke a makwaara dị ka Zindzi Mandela-Hlongwane, bụ onye nnọchi anya mba South Africa na onye na-ede uri, na nwa nwanyị nke ndị na-emegide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Nelson Mandela na Winnie Madikizela-Mandela. Zindzi bụ nwa ikpeazụ na nke atọ n'ime ụmụ nwanyị atọ nke Nelson Mandela, gụnyere nwanne nwanyị Zenani Mandela.

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nnọchi anya mba ya na Denmark, ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ na 2020, ọ ga-eweghara ọrụ dị ka ihe nnọchi anya na Liberia. Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nnọchi anya nwanyị mbụ nke South Africa site na 1996 ruo 1998.
E bipụtara nchịkọta uri ya, Black As I Am, na 1978, na foto nke Peter Magubane.

A mụrụ Zindzi Mandela na 23 Disemba 1960 na Soweto, n'ihe bụ Union of South Africa n'oge ahụ, nye Nelson na Winnie Mandela. Afọ a mụrụ ya bụkwa afọ African National Congress (ANC) malitere ngalaba agha ya

Gọọmentị chọrọ nne na nna ya.  Zindzi dị ọnwa iri na asatọ mgbe e zigara nna ya n'ụlọ mkpọrọ.  N'oge ọ na-eto eto, a na-ahapụkarị ya n'aka nwanne ya nwanyị nke okenye Zenani Mandela mgbe a tụrụ nne ya mkpọrọ ọtụtụ ọnwa n'otu oge.
N'afọ 1977, mgbe a chụpụrụ nne ya na Orange Free State, Zindzi sooro ya biri n'ebe ahụ
Zindzi enweghị ike ịgụcha akwụkwọ ya ruo mgbe e zigara ya Swaziland. N'ikpeazụ, e kwere ka nne ya laghachi Soweto. Onye isi ala nke oge ahụ, P
W
Botha, nyere nna Zindzi ntọhapụ na 1985
Otu n'ime nne na nna ya enweghị ike inye nzaghachi nna ya
N'ihi ya, a họọrọ Zindzi ka ọ gụọ ọjụjụ ya na nzukọ ọha na eze na 10 Febụwarị 1985.

E bipụtara uri ya na 1978 n'akwụkwọ Black as I Am, ya na foto nke Peter Magubane, ọ pụtakwara na mbipụta gụnyere Somehow We Survive: An Anthology of South African Writing, nke Sterling Plumpp dezigharịrị, na Daughters of Africa: An International Anthology of Words and Writings by Women of African Descent, nke Margaret Busby dezigharị. Zindzi gụrụ akwụkwọ iwu na Mahadum nke Cape Town, ebe ọ nwetara BA na 1985.
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-anọchite anya nwanyị mbụ nke South Africa site na 1996 ruo 1998, n'etiti ịgba alụkwaghịm nne na nna ya na Graça Machel.
A họpụtara Zindzi ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya South Africa na Denmark n'afọ 2014

O rutere Denmark na June 2015. Na June 2019, mgbe ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya na Denmark, akaụntụ Twitter Mandela zigara usoro tweets siri ike, ebe ọ tụlere "ndị ụjọ na-atụ ụjọ bụ ndị na-ezu ohi na-edina Van Riebeck [sic]", na "ndị ọbịa a na-akpọghị òkù na-achọghị ịpụ" nke kpatara nnukwu esemokwu. Mandela-Hlongwane gosipụtara n'ọnwa ahụ "ịhụnanya na nkwanye ùgwù miri emi, nke na-enweghị atụ" maka "CIC" (onye ndú) nke Economic Freedom Fighters (EFF), Julius Malema.

Mgbe Ngalaba Na-ahụ Maka Mmekọrịta na Nkwado Mba Nile (DIRCO) na-enyocha ya maka imebi iwu mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta ha, Mandela nọgidere na-enupụ isi, na-ezigara Twitter na "Adịghị m ịza ajụjụ nye onye ọcha ọ bụla maka echiche nke onwe m
Enweghị missus ma ọ bụ baas ebe a

Nwee onwe gị #OurLand". Minista na-ahụ maka mba ofesi bụ Naledi Pandor nyere ya iwu ka ọ "na-akpa onwe ya dị ka onye nnọchi anya mba ọzọ" ma na-agbaso iwu mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta nke ngalaba ahụ, onye bụbu onye isi ala Thabo Mbeki gosipụtara nchegbu banyere echiche ya, a kọwakwara echiche ya dị ka okwu ịkpọasị nke onye agha ANC bụ Mavuso Msimang, ebe echiche ya nwetara nkwado site na EFF na onye isi ala nke KwaZulu-Natal Sihle Zikalala. tweets ya bịara nso na njedebe nke afọ anọ ya dị ka onye nnọchi anya na Denmark.
N'oge ọ nwụrụ na Johannesburg, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya na Liberia, ọrụ ndị ezinụlọ kọwara dị ka " ntaramahụhụ" maka tweets ya na-ese okwu n'afọ gara aga.

Zindzi lụrụ di ugboro abụọ ma mụọ ụmụ anọ site n'aka di mbụ ya: nwa nwanyị Zoleka Mandela (1980) na ụmụ nwoke Zondwa Mandela (1985), Bambatha Mandela (1989) na Zwelabo Mandela (1992). Di mbụ ya bụ Zwelibanzi Hlongwane Ọ lụrụ di ya nke abụọ, Molapo Motlhajwa, onye bụ onye otu South African National Defence Force, na Machị 2013.
A na-ekwu na Mandela-Hlongwane kwetara ịhazi egwuregwu ịkụ ọkpọ n'etiti Floyd Mayweather na Manny Pacquiao iji kwekọọ na ụbọchị ọmụmụ nna ya na 2011
Egwuregwu ahụ emeghị ma onye na-akwalite ịkụ ọkpọ Duane Moody gbara akwụkwọ n'ụzọ gara nke ọma maka ụlọ ikpe US iji nye iwu ka ọ kwụọ US $ 4.7m, tinyere ụgwọ, maka mmebi Moody
A tụrụ anya na Mandela-Hlongwane ga-arịọ arịrịọ.
Zindzi nwụrụ na 13 Julaị 2020, n'ụlọ ọgwụ dị na Johannesburg mgbe ọ dị afọ 59. A kpughere na ọ nwalere COVID-19 n'ụbọchị ọ nwụrụ

Otú ọ dị, ekwughị na nje ahụ bụ ihe kpatara ọnwụ ya ka ezinụlọ ya na-echere akụkọ nyocha ozu. E liri ya n'akụkụ nne ya, Winnie Madikizela-Mandela, na Fourways Memorial Park na 17 Julaị, otu ụbọchị tupu ihe ga-abụ ụbọchị ọmụmụ nke 102 nke nna ya nwụrụ anwụ, Nelson Mandela.
Àtụ:Nelson Mandela
